alert.note: Alert for Christian (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 7:39AM CDT until March 26 at 11:25AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian and Stone. * WHEN...Until 330 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 737 AM CDT, The Department of Transportation reported numerous road closures due to the 3 and 5 inches of rain that fell last night and this morning. - This includes the following low water crossings... Bull Creek at Center Road, Swan Creek at Swan Cave Road, Woods Fork at Woods Fork Road, Finley River at Johns Ford Road, and Tory Creek at Highway O. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
